description: Smallest number whose digit sum is n^4.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,9
mathematica: Do[ a = {}; While[ Apply[ Plus, a ] + 9 < n^4, a = Append[ a, 9 ] ]; If[ Apply[ Plus, a ] != n^4, a = Prepend[ a, n^4 - Apply[ Plus, a ] ] ]; Print[ FromDigits[ a ] ], {n, 1, 6} ]
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 9, s=n^4; x=s\9; d=s - 9*x; write("b060711.txt", n, " ", (d+1)*10^x - 1); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 10 2009]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 21 2001
